name: weatherapp
description: ## Project Overview This is my **2nd** project on [Udacity](https://www.udacity.com/), in this project they require us to create an asynchronous web application that uses Web API and user data to dynamically update the UI, using the API provided by [OpenWeatherAPI](https://openweathermap.org/api) we going to manipulate the data we receive from this API and display it to the users.
author: Hesham Mohamed hesham.m.ali.blogger@gmail.com
